metadata.title: CVE-2024-21853 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper finite state machines (FSMs) in the hardware logic in some 4th and5th Generation Intel(R) Xeon(R) Processors may allow an authorized user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
